ai-atk-s0403a35:2_1: he destroys the ten central fields,
ai-atk-s0403a35:2_3: in the second (story) from True Dhamma.
ai-atk-s0403a35:2_4: Entering an uneducated ordinary person, not shared with those who are unrestrained.
ai-atk-s0403a35:4_1: After doing so, they still think, “Name formations are impermanent, not lasting,”
ai-atk-s0403a35:4_2: The meaning is endowed with non-human beings whose fostering will set it up.
ai-atk-s0403a35:4_4: “It is in so that the ascetic life is the meaning.
ai-atk-s0403a35:6_1: Eight conduct is loving-kindness towards me.
ai-atk-s0403a35:6_2: For I have a trainee with defilements ended, who associates with the Realised One,
ai-atk-s0403a35:8_1: In the ninth enquiry, craving is what is called.
ai-atk-s0403a35:8_2: Since I have the view of that,
ai-atk-s0403a35:8_3: and my mental development has application of craving.
ai-atk-s0403a35:9_0: The tenth sub-chapter on these is finished.
